bug.author: ndrix
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
You have a reference to fclib; but this may reference to <denchmark-link:https://pypi.org/project/fclib/>https://pypi.org/project/fclib/</denchmark-link> - which is not the library you're probably looking for. (The intended fclib is available on azure artifacts - not pypi). It is included in
forecasting/tools/environment_setup.sh
Line 17 in 12e2044
pip install -e fclib
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
You'll need to specify the artifacts URL, or rename the library. <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
Please contact me on <denchmark-link:mailto:mihendri@microsoft.com>mihendri@microsoft.com</denchmark-link> for more information.
